rtables 0.3.5
  • Reference
  • Articles
  • Changelog

Convert an rtable object to a shiny.tag html object

Source: R/as_html.R
as_html.Rd

The returned html object can be immediately used in shiny and rmarkdown.

as_html(
  x,
  width = NULL,
  class_table = "table table-condensed table-hover",
  class_tr = "",
  class_td = "",
  class_th = ""
)

Arguments

x

rtable object
width

width
class_table

class for table tag
class_tr

class for tr tag
class_td

class for td tag
class_th

class for th tag

Examples


tbl <- rtable(
  header = LETTERS[1:3],
  format = "xx",
  rrow("r1", 1,2,3),
  rrow("r2", 4,3,2, indent = 1),
  rrow("r3", indent = 2)
)

as_html(tbl)
#> <table class="table table-condensed table-hover">
#>   <tr class="">
#>     <th class=" text-left" colspan="1"></th>
#>     <th class=" text-center" colspan="1">A</th>
#>     <th class=" text-center" colspan="1">B</th>
#>     <th class=" text-center" colspan="1">C</th>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr class="">
#>     <td class=" text-left" colspan="1">r1</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">1</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">2</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">3</td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr class="">
#>     <td class=" text-left" colspan="1">r2</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">4</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">3</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">2</td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr class="">
#>     <td class=" text-left" colspan="1">r3</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1"></td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1"></td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1"></td>
#>   </tr>
#> </table>

as_html(tbl, class_table = "table", class_tr = "row")
#> <table class="table">
#>   <tr class="row">
#>     <th class=" text-left" colspan="1"></th>
#>     <th class=" text-center" colspan="1">A</th>
#>     <th class=" text-center" colspan="1">B</th>
#>     <th class=" text-center" colspan="1">C</th>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr class="row">
#>     <td class=" text-left" colspan="1">r1</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">1</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">2</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">3</td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr class="row">
#>     <td class=" text-left" colspan="1">r2</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">4</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">3</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">2</td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr class="row">
#>     <td class=" text-left" colspan="1">r3</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1"></td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1"></td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1"></td>
#>   </tr>
#> </table>

as_html(tbl, class_td = "aaa")
#> <table class="table table-condensed table-hover">
#>   <tr class="">
#>     <th class=" text-left" colspan="1"></th>
#>     <th class=" text-center" colspan="1">A</th>
#>     <th class=" text-center" colspan="1">B</th>
#>     <th class=" text-center" colspan="1">C</th>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr class="">
#>     <td class=" text-left" colspan="1">r1</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">1</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">2</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">3</td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr class="">
#>     <td class=" text-left" colspan="1">r2</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">4</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">3</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1">2</td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr class="">
#>     <td class=" text-left" colspan="1">r3</td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1"></td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1"></td>
#>     <td class=" text-center" colspan="1"></td>
#>   </tr>
#> </table>

if (FALSE) {
Viewer(tbl)
}
